title: [Tartifacts Bakery]
description: Light pierces the windows and strikes dozens of cut glass display cases, sending rainbows of color dancing around the walls of this decadent shrine to the tart.  Young halflings run around, tripping over each other to polish the sparkling silver tables normally filled with chatting patrons.

Moonlight pierces the windows and strikes dozens of cut glass display cases, sending rainbows of color dancing around the walls of this decadent shrine to the tart.  Young halflings run around, tripping over each other to polish the sparkling silver tables normally filled with chatting patrons.
